import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import passService from "../../services/pass.services" import * as AlertDialog from '@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog'; import './PassCard.css' const PassCard = ({ movie, fetchPasses, _id }) => { const handleClick = () => { passService .deletePass(_id) .then(() => fetchPasses()) .catch((error) => console.log(error)) }; return ( {movie.title} < AlertDialog.Overlay className="overlay" /> Â¿Estas completamente seguro? Esta accion no se puede deshacer, se eliminara completamente de la base de datos
) } export default PassCard;
